channel.title: Test amplification on
channel.description: Recent content in Test amplification on

item.title: An approach and benchmark to detect behavioral changes of commits in continuous integration.
A snowballing literature study on test amplification.
Diff-test-selection
item.description: diff-test-selection Â· Diff-Test-Selection aims at selecting the subset of test classes and methods that execute the changed code between two versions of the same program. It relies on Clover and Maven to compute the coverage and returns this subset of tests. Diff-Test-Selection is implemented as a maven plugin that directly works from the command line, without modifying your pom.xml. See below for more details. Usage We advise you to use the maven plugin.

item.title: DSpot
item.description: DSpot DSpot is a tool that generates missing assertions in JUnit tests. DSpot takes as input a Java project with an existing test suite. DSpot generates new test cases from existing ones and write them on disk. DSpot supports Java projects built with Maven and Gradle (see the --automatic-builder option) DSpot ecosystem: Jenkins plugin Eclipse plugin IntelliJ plugin Getting started Demo site Meet our demonstration website at https://dspot-demo.
